results.content: Lectures are not updated. Libraries outdated!

It is a very well-put-together course, and frankly, buying and taking this is by far one of the best decisions I have made this year.  The stuff does make sense even for someone like me who had never looked at any Nodejs material before, although I will still cover the Nodejs material in the future so I know the thought process behind the tutor's choices. I think I am falling in love with the back-end. I never thought I'd see this day.  Thank you and well done.

He is by no means a web designer though, but he's a brilliant developer.
results.content_html:

results.content: it was great! covering the basics and explaining how to do things. makes me feel like i know nodejs now :)
